notes.text: Worldwide
notes.title: Countries and Areas Deployed

notes.text: Suzhou, China
notes.title: Company Headquarters Location

notes.text: None
notes.title: Critical Infrastructure Sectors

notes.text: ECOVACS lawnmowers, vacuums, and other robots contain multiple vulnerabilities. In some cases, using a combination of vulnerabilities, an attacker within Bluetooth range or with appropriate network access can take complete control of a robot device. Some vulnerabilities allow an attacker to access device cameras and microphones. Note that the list of affected products is incomplete.
notes.title: Risk Evaluation
Recommended Practices
notes.text: Review ECOVACS advisories and update robot firmware and mobile apps.

cwe.name: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection')

notes.text: ECOVACS robot lawnmowers and vacuums are vulnerable to command injection via SetNetPin() over unauthenticated BLE connection.
notes.title: Description

vulnerabilities.title: ECOVACS robot lawnmowers and vacuums command injection

cwe.name: Incorrect Permission Assignment for Critical Resource

notes.text: ECOVACS robot lawnmowers and vacuums insecurely store audio files used to indicate the camera is on. An attacker with access to the /data filesystem can delete or modify warning files such that users may not be aware that the camera is on.
notes.title: Description

vulnerabilities.title: ECOVACS lawnmowers and vacuums insecurely store audio warning files

remediations.details: Any ECOVACS robot with a camera is likely to be affected.

notes.text: ECOVACS HOME mobile app plugins for specific robots do not properly validate TLS certificates. An unauthenticated attacker can read or modify TLS traffic and obtain authentication tokens.
notes.title: Description

vulnerabilities.title: ECOVACS HOME mobile app plugins do not properly validate TLS certificates

remediations.details: ECOVACS released version 3.0.0 of the ECOVACS HOME app. ECOVACS may have updated plugins for specific robots.
ECOVACS released version 3.0.0 of the ECOVACS HOME app. ECOVACS may have updated plugins for specific robots.

notes.text: ECOVACS lawnmowers and vacuums do not properly validate TLS certificates. An unauthenticated attacker can read or modify TLS traffic, possibly modifying firmware updates.
notes.title: Description

vulnerabilities.title: ECOVACS lawnmowers and vacuums do not properly validate TLS certificates

cwe.name: Download of Code Without Integrity Check

notes.text: ECOVACS robot lawnmowers and vacuums use a deterministic symmetric key to decrypt firmware updates. An attacker can create and encrypt malicious firmware that will be successfully decrypted and installed by the robot.
notes.title: Description

vulnerabilities.title: ECOVACS lawnmowers and vacuums deterministic firmware encryption key

notes.text: ECOVACS robot lawnmowers and vacuums use a deterministic root password generated based on model and serial number. An attacker with shell access can login as root.
notes.title: Description

vulnerabilities.title: ECOVACS lawnmowers and vacuums deterministic root password

notes.text: ECOVACS robot lawn mowers and vacuums use a shared, static secret key to encrypt BLE GATT messages. An unauthenticated attacker within BLE range can control any robot using the same key.
notes.title: Description

vulnerabilities.title: ECOVACS lawnmowers and vacuums static BLE GATT encryption key

notes.text: ECOVACS robot lawnmowers store the anti-theft PIN in cleartext on the device filesystem. An attacker can steal a lawnmower, read the PIN, and reset the anti-theft mechanism.
notes.title: Description

vulnerabilities.title: ECOVACS lawnmowers cleartext storage of anti-theft PIN

notes.text: The cloud service used by ECOVACS robot lawnmowers and vacuums allows authenticated attackers to bypass the PIN entry required to access the live video feed.
notes.title: Description

vulnerabilities.title: ECOVACS lawnmower and vacuum cloud service live video PIN bypass

remediations.details: ECOVACS updated the cloud service and ECOVACS HOME mobile apps.
ECOVACS updated the cloud service and ECOVACS HOME mobile apps.
ECOVACS updated the cloud service and ECOVACS HOME mobile apps.
ECOVACS updated the cloud service and ECOVACS HOME mobile apps.
